Text:
This is NOT an official sequel. It is a fan project. Download the original New Super Mario Bros Wii:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6222454/
Guys, I found 1 video... the channel "semideiassl"...the name of video is "Newer Super Mario Bros Wii - Introdução do game !"

Thanks first to Hobbitgamez for putting this together in a .WBFS!  

Works fine on a 4.3J using wiiflow.  A great game and a must have for any mario fan.  

Thanks to the crew who made it.  The best fan project I have yet to see.  These guys really put together a quality game.
Was looking forward to it.Many thanks hobbit
